      Set one life less It places the ghosts back to their orignal spawning position due to a placeGhost method

      • GameManager

        public GameManager​(javafx.scene.Group root,

        Constructor used to preset everything for the day
        Parameters:

        map - Map is where the directory for the map will be held

    • Method Detail

      • lifeLost

        private void lifeLost()
        Set one life less It places the ghosts back to their orignal spawning position due to a placeGhost method

      • endGame

        private void endGame()
        Ends the game Removes everything before ending the game to reduce unnecessary background work

      • restartGameOrMenu

        public void restartGameOrMenu​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
        Restart the game Upon ending the game the user can either Restart the game, go to main menu or save their score.
        Parameters:
        event - This event looks out for any keys being pressed to trigger the method to run.

      • drawBoard

        public void drawBoard()
        Draws the board of the game with the cookies and the Pacman pacSound is used to play audio, in this case its used for the level start music

      • movePacman

        public void movePacman​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
        Moves the pacman Moves constantly until either a obstacle is hit or user changes PacMans direction
        Parameters:
        event - this event just looks out for keys pressed to change the Pacmans animation

      • createAnimation

        private javafx.animation.AnimationTimer createAnimation​(java.lang.String direction)
        Creates an animation of the movement.
        Parameters:
        direction - By having direction we can unsure that Pacman rotates to face the way he is moving
        Returns:
        The Pacmans X, Y is used to implement the portal feature, I did this by setting triggers which will move the sprite

      • checkCookieCollection

        private void checkCookieCollection​(Pacman pacman,
                                   java.lang.String axis)
        Checks if the Pacman touches cookies.
        Parameters:
        pacman - Parameter is necessary to detect if the Pacman eats a cookie
        axis - Used to check if Pacman is facing right

      • checkGhostCoalition

        public void checkGhostCoalition()
        Checks if pacman is touching a ghost If he is touching a ghost it triggers the lifeLost method which will prompt Pacman to respawn with 1 life less
